website_summaries.verdict: The view is clear and bright with these HD binoculars from Gosky.
pros: The binoculars come with bag for carrying and phone mount strap
Hardy rubber case absorbs shock and repels moisture
The 8x magnification is ideal for on-the-go viewing
Phone adapter is an excellent feature for photography and recording
cons: Pricier than some other portable binoculars

customer_reviews.title: good quality great price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these binoculars for a family birding trip. The GoSky were comparable to another more expensive set with the same magnification that we already had. So we actually got two for the price of one. Worked great, easy to focus. The phone attachment was a bit cumbersome-difficult to click the photo while holding the binoculars steady-it may work better for an android that has the voice photo click option. I don't think I will use the attachment too much. Definitely would recommend the binoculars. Hopefully the warranty will be as good as the other brand if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Binoculars for Bird Watching
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bird watching but must be pretty close! Not great for things far away! Picture is clear and love the strap so I can carry them easily!
customer_reviews.author: Stanobebe

customer_reviews.title: Works with Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to find nice binoculars that work with glasses. I love the lens caps that hang still attached so you don't lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best binoculars in this category. Their great for bird watching and sports events. I like theireye piece best.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Came with everything!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent gift and of better quality binoculars than previously bought. It came with a case and strap and Iphone adapter to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jean Loo

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife as a gift, she is happy with the image quality and the apparent build quality. As a user of high end sporting optics, I was favorably impressed with these for the cost. The digiscoping attachment is neat and easier to use than other budget models I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a army green 8\42 . Wasn’t marked on box 8-42 . And it is black ! Please let me know if the 8/42 was shipped to me . Don’t want to take apart box again cause it’s a gift ! Thank you jtlamon@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: HML

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these binocs!! I bought them for an ornithology class to use on birding field trips. I chose them because they are one of the lighter pairs i could find, but the viewing quality is wonderful and the neck straps are comfortable. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for an avid hunter. He stated the Binoculars are build well, provide great clarity and so far have handled rugged handling.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Eyepiece came apart after three months of use
customer_reviews.text: I used these binoculars whilst hiking, at first they were very good but after limited use the right eyepiece came off. I cannot adjust the focus in the right lens at all so these binoculars have turned into a telescope!' I have been unable to contact the seller to fix or replace the item. AJF Houston, Texas
customer_reviews.author: Alan Foley

product_meta.title: Gosky 8x42 Binoculars for Adults, Compact HD Professional Binoculars for Bird Watching Travel Stargazing Hunting Concerts Sports-BAK4 Prism FMC Lens-with Phone Mount Strap Carrying Bag
feature_bullets: 【8X42 BINOCULARS WITH SUPERIOR OPTICS】：42mm Fully multi-layer coatings green film objective lens and 18mm blue film eyepiece garentee the key elements of an optical device, make your view brighter, clearer and deliver crisp images

【PTIMUM MAGNIFICATION】: 8x42 binoculars are best for bird watching during long viewing sessions. 8x magnification is less shaky than the 10x. Many experienced bird watchers prefer them. This magnification is also good for other universal outdoor applications like stargazing, climbing, hunting and indoor applications like watching large stage play, vocal concert, a football game, etc
【O-RING SEALED RAINPROOF AND SHOCK-ABSORBING RUBBER ARMOR】: The binoculars are O-ring sealed rainproof and the shock-absorbing rubber armor for maximum protection.
【RICH AND USEFUL ACCESSORIES】: With Soft Carrying Case, Neck Strap Belt, Flip Down Lens Caps and Cleaning Cloth, this power binoculars can be carried and stored safely and conveniently.
【GOSKY NEWEST QUICK ALIGNMENT SMARTPHONE MOUNT】Compatible with iphone X, 8plus, 8,7plus, 7, 6, 6s, 6plus, 5, 5s, Samsung GALAXY S6, S6 Edge, S5 , Note, LG, HTV, Sony, Etc.
